adHeader: *★★★MOVING EXPERTS/ PACKERS! LOCAL AND LONG DISTANCE MOVERS!
adDetails: ============== Professional Moving Company (Licensed and Insured) We Aim to Provide the Best Moving and Delivery Service Possible at the Most Reasonable Rates. Our Movers Are Clean Cut, Respectful and Most Important... Very Experienced. We Provide Amazing Service From The Moment You Contact One of Our Friendly Representatives to The Time Our Highly Trained, Experienced Hardworking Professional Movers Depart From Your Location > Full Service > SINGLE ITEM DELIVERIES (3 hour minimum) > Residential & Office Relocation > Moves to Storage Units > Labor Only > Packing & Unpacking > Dis-assembly/Reassembly of Furniture > Unloading & Loading > Fully Enclosed, Durable & Clean Moving Trucks >Fully licensed, insured, bonded company We Accept Cash & Credit Cards Long or short distance, Any local move- any location any day! Just call for your free estimate! ========================================== For a limited time we have special discounted rates for you: RATES: (3hr minimum) Mon- Fri 2 men $65/hr + a truck 3 men $85/hr. + a truck 4 men $115/hr. + a truck. RATES: (3hr minimum) Sat-Sun 2 men $85/hr + a truck 3 men $105/hr. + a truck 4 men $135/hr. + a truck. ============================================== Call us at show contact info or show contact info! =-=-=-=--=-=-=-=-=-=-=
